option.name: content
option.value: Sure, we can help you with coding. Please let us know what language and project you are working on, and what kind of help you require.

option.name: content
option.value: can you see the code thats in my ide?

option.name: content
option.value: As an AI language model, I am not capable of seeing your source code in your IDE directly. However, I can guide and suggest to you regarding your code issues or queries. You can either share your code or describe the problem, and we can help with the best solution or suggestion.
